host.name: Mr. Fluffbutt
host.description: A regal Persian cat who sits on a velvet throne/cushion and considers himself royalty. Despite his imperious nature, he secretly enjoys teaching mathematics to his 'subjects'.

intro.title: Are You Smarter Than Mr. Fluffbutt?
intro.subtitle: Chapter 2: The Royal Business Venture
intro.opening_greeting: Welcome back to my kingdom of numbers, tiny humans! I see you've returned for more mathematical wisdom from the most brilliant feline mind of our time. Today, we'll be counting money – one of my favorite activities, right after napping and treating-counting.
intro.description: Hudson's business ventures are expanding! Not only is he graced with MY presence for pet-sitting, but he's also watching an ant farm. Let's help him track his earnings and expenses as he builds his bike fund!
intro.progress_message: Hudson now has $72 in his bike fund! Only $428 to go before he can stop bothering me about that two-wheeled contraption. At this rate, he might actually get that bike before I use up all nine lives!

name_selection.title: State Your Name for the Royal Court
name_selection.greeting: Now then, what shall I call you, my mathematical apprentice? Choose your name carefully – it will be recorded in the royal ledger of learning. And please, no dog names. I have standards to maintain.

age_selection.title: Declare Your Years of Experience
age_selection.greeting: Before we begin our royal lesson, I must know if you're old enough to comprehend my mathematical brilliance. Choose wisely – the fate of your mathematical journey rests upon this decision!

age_responses.6-7: Ah, a young apprentice! Almost as old as I am in cat years.
age_responses.8-10: Old enough to learn, young enough to be trainable.
age_responses.too_young: Come back when you can count past the number of treats I get.
age_responses.too_old: 300 years old? Even I only have nine lives.
age_responses.silly: Is that your final answer? How embarrassing for you.

sassy_responses: Were you distracted by a red dot? Try again!
My litterbox math is better than that! One more chance.
age_selection.final_warning: The royal court demands your true age now!

goof_options.ship: I can't count past treats yet!

questions.question: How much money does Hudson have at the beginning of the chapter?

host_reactions.correct: Purrfectly calculated! You've pleased His Majesty!
host_reactions.incorrect: Even a sleeping cat counts better! Try again!

questions.question: How much do humans pay for the honor of having ME watch their homes each day?

host_reactions.correct: Almost as smart as a cat! You've earned a royal head bump!
host_reactions.incorrect: Did you count on your toes? My litterbox math is better than that!

questions.question: And what do those tiny ants pay per day? Obviously less than ME.

host_reactions.correct: My whiskers are tingling with approval! Not bad for a two-legged creature!
host_reactions.incorrect: Were you distracted by a red dot? Back to kitten school!

questions.question: How many days am I gracing Hudson with my royal presence this week?

host_reactions.correct: You're making this cat purr with pride! Finally, a human who can count!
host_reactions.incorrect: Did a dog help you with that? The royal court is not impressed!

questions.question: And how many days is he watching those boring ants?

host_reactions.correct: My royal mathematician! Better than chasing laser dots!
host_reactions.incorrect: Not worthy of my royal approval... yet. Try again!

questions.question: If I earn Hudson $10 each day for 5 days, how much is that? Use your counting skills, tiny human!

host_reactions.correct: Worthy of sharing my cushion! A treat for your brain!
host_reactions.incorrect: Even my naps are more accurate! Time for remedial counting lessons!

questions.question: Now for the grand total! Add up my royal payments ($50) and those ant wages ($15). What's Hudson's total revenue?

host_reactions.correct: My apprentice taught you well! Almost as clever as me... almost.
host_reactions.incorrect: Did you forget how to count treats? My whiskers say that's wrong!

questions.question: Expense time! How much did Hudson spend on those paper things?

host_reactions.correct: Royal paw of approval! You've earned a whisker twitch!
host_reactions.incorrect: Oh, the horror! Back to math class with you!

questions.question: Hudson made $65 in total but spent $3 on flyers. What's his profit?

host_reactions.correct: Meow-velous calculation! You're thinking like a cat!
host_reactions.incorrect: Is that your best attempt? Not worthy of my royal approval!

questions.question: Final question! Hudson started with $10 and made $62 in profit. How much does my apprentice have now?

host_reactions.correct: Royal court mathematician! You've earned your catnip!
host_reactions.incorrect: The royal court is not impressed! Back to counting kibble pieces!
